Class GenericRepository<T>

Namespace
Innovt.Data.EFCore.Repositories
Assembly
Innovt.Data.EFCore.dll

Generic repository implementation for accessing and managing entities of type T. Inherits from RepositoryBase for shared functionality and extends for specific entity type.

public class GenericRepository<T> : RepositoryBase<T>, IRepository<T> where T : class

Type Parameters

T

The entity type.
